'''''"The Peak"''''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Duelist: Series III]]''. 

The achievements are earned by defeating the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Tatankasaurus|text=The Peak &mdash; Mutant Species That Fell into the Volcano}} while completing challenge conditions.
